_xResult.title: On a Beam Coat
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made yellow coat with black buttons
_xResult.longdesc:
Balance can be hard to find. Sometimes, walking through life can feel like sliding on a balance beam. This gorgeous custom made cashmere coat will keep you walking that tightrope: buttons, cuffs, side pockets and all. Beautiful black piping and rich buttons make this made to measure jacket one-of-a-kind.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
